quote: The very nastiest and coarsest, I can't tell you. It is not grief, not dullness, but much worse. It is as if all that was good in me had hidden itself, and only what is horrid remains.
quote_letters: THE VERY NASTIEST AND COARSEST I CANT TELL YOU IT IS NOT GRIEF NOT DULLNESS BUT MUCH WORSE IT IS AS IF ALL THAT WAS GOOD IN ME HAD HIDDEN ITSELF AND ONLY WHAT IS HORRID REMAINS
